title: FEEL THE POWER
lyrics:
When the world around you
Is up in flames
I'll be there to guide you
Through the worst of pain

I believe in second chance

I believe in new beginnings

I'm going down a beaten path

Just to find myself in a melody



I gotta find myself



Come on, come on

Come on, come on

Feel the power



Keep your head up kid you're gonna be someone someday

My hardest piece when you got nothing else to say

Feel the power



Come on, come on

Come on, come on

Feel the power



Feel the power



Feel the power



When the world around you

Is up in flames

I'll be there to guide you

Through the worst of pain



I believe in second chance

I believe in new beginnings

I'm going down a beaten path

I gotta find myself



Come on, come on

Feel the power

Feel the power
